name: P-Ball (Clop)
description: Welcome to September 22nd, 2002, Autumn Equinox. A little ball needs to navigate through the land to get towards his house to play “P-Ball” on his Sony PlayStation. This game took me a while to complete, especially with my whole entire project crashing  down a few days ago, Yikes!  I only worked about a few hours on  it before the deadline and I plan on  doing a big update soon. I also might re-release the original game for the jam as a bonus or something.  I hope you enjoy this short treat to remind this generation of our past glory!  ***UPDATE: Download is fixed now; Game is still a little buggy and I plan on fixing this in a few days***
